name: Footy Ball: Pass Pass Soccer
description:
The new lean, mean game of soccer. Fast, high-tempo games of football designed for pick-up and play.

Quick matches where the players auto-run and you use one finger to pass and score wonderful goals. Its easy to learn but hard to master in this semi-retro game.

Take your fictitious team from the lower leagues at the start of the 2017 - 2018 season to the top tier of your chosen country.


BE THE PLAYER, BE THE MANAGER
You decide the team and how you play. Decide on the formation and tactics, purchase players, make the decisive plays as you make your way up the leagues.
Improve your team by playing the youngsters and giving them playing time. Build the team, buy and sell players on the transfer market.

INTUITIVE ONE-TOUCH CONTROLS
Just swipe, drag or tap for kicks, curl, shots, passes, sprints and sliding tackles. On the pitch it's all about finding the right pass or shot and the timing of sliding tackles. Off the pitch, easily change your formation and tactics with just a finger. You decide how your players make their important attacking runs.

FUNDAMENTALS OF SOCCER
This is a stripped down game of soccer that is all about kicking the ball and timing. Direct the shots and pass to other players or into open space. Sprint on to through balls. Chase down the opponent and time the sliding tackles. This is a game without offsides, free-kicks, fouls and fatigue. Just fast and pure gameplay for mobiles.

MANY DIFFERENT LEAGUES
Choose your team from either England, Spain, Germany or Italy. Start from the fifth-tier league and work your way to the top.
